## ClientConfig.fetch property

The data to fetch beforehand when initializing the client. This can delay the initialization but makes the rest of the processes much faster.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fetch?: {
        champions?: boolean;
        items?: boolean;
        runes?: boolean;
        summonerSpells?: boolean;
    };
```
